statements: SELECT user_id, permission_role, data_privacy_settings FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_role, user_id FROM user_permissions WHERE data_privacy_settings = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT permission_role, data_privacy_settings FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_role FROM user_permissions WHERE data_privacy_settings = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_role FROM user_permissions WHERE data_privacy_settings = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_role LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_role FROM user_permissions WHERE data_privacy_settings = FALSE ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_role = 'editor';
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, last_updated FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPermissions WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM UserPermissions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, last_updated, permission_level FROM UserPermissions ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS permissions_count FROM UserPermissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(permission_level) AS highest_permission FROM UserPermissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, privacy_settings FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' AND target_audience = 'Women';
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE target_audience ILIKE '%young%';
SELECT user_id, permission_level, privacy_settings FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_privacy_settings WHERE setting_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, data_name FROM user_data WHERE data_type = 'image';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_level, permission_category FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level > 3;
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_type FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT setting_id, setting_name, setting_description FROM data_privacy_settings WHERE LENGTH(setting_name) > 10 ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM user_permissions JOIN permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice';
SELECT u.username, ps.location_privacy, ps.data_collection_privacy FROM users u JOIN privacy_settings ps ON u.user_id = ps.user_id WHERE ps.data_collection_privacy = true;
